verbs.description: There [V: were] [ARG1: seven women and 10 minorities] [ARGM-LOC: in Barack Obama 's first 22-member Cabinet] , [ARGM-ADV: while Donald Trump 's 24-member Cabinet has four women and four minorities] .
There were seven women and 10 minorities in Barack Obama 's first 22-member Cabinet , while [ARG0: Donald Trump 's 24-member Cabinet] [V: has] [ARG1: four women and four minorities] .
